name: Silent Hill 2 - James Sunderland
description:
A simple picture of James Sunderland at the bottom-right corner of the screen so he can stare in disappointment at /v/ along with you! Made this to go with my trip on /v/.

Before: Typical 4chan.org layout.
After: http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w143/Ariikado/stylish.jpg?t=1245898984

NOTE: This is using two other stylish codes. "HURR2" and "Remove ads from 4chan.org".

HURR2 Link: http://userstyles.org/styles/13273
Remove ads from 4chan.org Link: http://userstyles.org/styles/503
